problem.markdown:
>>If a 2 dimensional array \(A\) is stored in a row major fashion in memory, then \(A[i, j]\) and \(A[i, j + 1]\) are <<
(x) next to each other ( ) more than one memory location apart

multiplechoiceresponse.label: If a 2 dimensional array \(A\) is stored in a row major fashion in memory, then \(A[i, j]\) and \(A[i, j + 1]\) are

choicegroup.choice: more than one memory location apart
